excel.desc: 學校資料匯入

column.desc: 訓練協調經理聯絡電話
訓練協調經理聯絡分機

param.desc: TD_SCHOOL_BASE內部編號

param.funcParam: SELECT CITY_UID FROM TB_CITY WHERE CITY_NAME ='#CITY#'
SELECT TOWN_UID FROM TB_TOWN A LEFT JOIN TB_CITY B ON A.CITY_UID = B.CITY_UID WHERE CITY_NAME ='#CITY#' AND TOWN_NAME ='#TOWN#'
SELECT USER_UID FROM TS_USER WHERE USER_ID ='#ASSIGN#'
SELECT USER_UID FROM TS_USER WHERE USER_ID ='#ASSIGN#'

param.funcParam: SELECT CITY_UID FROM TB_CITY WHERE CITY_NAME ='#CITY#'
SELECT TOWN_UID FROM TB_TOWN A LEFT JOIN TB_CITY B ON A.CITY_UID = B.CITY_UID WHERE CITY_NAME ='#CITY#' AND TOWN_NAME ='#TOWN#'

SELECT USER_UID FROM TS_USER WHERE USER_ID ='#ASSIGN#'

excel.desc: 聯絡人資料匯入
人員匯入
原有人員清單匯入

param.funcParam: SELECT SEED_UID FROM TD_SEED WHERE (IDCARD_NUM ='#IDCARD_NUM#' or CHN_NAME='#NAME#')

excel.desc: 參與職類內容-學制

param.funcParam: SELECT SCHOOL_YEAR_UID FROM TD_SCHOOL_YEAR WHERE SCHOOL_ID = '#SCHOOL_ID#' AND CLASS_TYPE_UID = '20120911003905200001' AND UNIT_INFO_UID = '#UNIT_INFO_UID#'

SELECT ES_UID FROM TB_ES_YEAR WHERE ES_BASE_UID = (SELECT ES_BASE_UID FROM TB_ES_BASE WHERE ES_NAME_CHN = ( Decode('#ES_TYPE#', '1', '高職', '2', '二專', '3', '二技', '5', '四年制') )) AND CLASS_TYPE_UID = '20120911003905200001'

excel.desc: 參與職類內容-職類

param.funcParam: SELECT SK_UID FROM TB_SK WHERE SK_CHN_NAME = DECODE('#SK_TYPE#','1','管理類','2','工業類','3','服務類')

SELECT ST_UID FROM TB_ST_YEAR A LEFT JOIN TB_ST_BASE B ON A.ST_BASE_UID = B.ST_BASE_UID WHERE B.ST_ID = '#ST_TYPE#' AND CLASS_TYPE_UID = '20120911003905200001' AND ES_UID = (SELECT ES_UID FROM TB_ES_YEAR WHERE ES_BASE_UID = (SELECT ES_BASE_UID FROM TB_ES_BASE WHERE ES_NAME_CHN = ( Decode('#ES_TYPE#', '1', '高職', '2', '二專', '3', '二技', '5', '四年制') )) AND CLASS_TYPE_UID = '20120911003905200001')

excel.desc: 參與職類內容-科系
專班導師清單

param.funcParam: #MAIN_PHONE# - #BRANCH_PHONE#

excel.desc: 計畫申請學校年度合作事業單位檔

param.funcParam: SELECT CORP_BASE_UID FROM TD_CORP_BASE WHERE CORP_ID ='#CORP_ID#'

excel.desc: 計畫申請事業單位年度職類檔

param.funcParam: SELECT CORP_YEAR_UID FROM TD_CORP_YEAR WHERE CORP_ID = '#CORP_ID#' AND CLASS_TYPE_UID = '20120911003905200001' AND UNIT_INFO_UID = '#UNIT_INFO_UID#'

SELECT ES_UID FROM TB_ES_YEAR WHERE ES_BASE_UID = (SELECT ES_BASE_UID FROM TB_ES_BASE WHERE ES_NAME_CHN = Decode('#ES_TYPE#', '1', '高職', '2', '二專', '3', '二技', '5', '四年制')) AND CLASS_TYPE_UID ='20120911003905200001'
SELECT SK_UID FROM TB_SK WHERE SK_CHN_NAME = Decode('#SK_TYPE#', '1', '管理類', '2', '工業類', '3', '服務類')

SELECT ST_UID FROM TB_ST_YEAR A LEFT JOIN TB_ST_BASE B ON A.ST_BASE_UID = B.ST_BASE_UID WHERE B.ST_ID = '#ST_TYPE#' AND CLASS_TYPE_UID = '20120911003905200001' AND ES_UID IN (SELECT ES_UID FROM TB_ES_YEAR WHERE ES_BASE_UID = (SELECT ES_BASE_UID FROM TB_ES_BASE WHERE ES_NAME_CHN = Decode(#ES_TYPE#, '1', '高職', '2', '二專', '3', '二技','5', '四年制')) AND CLASS_TYPE_UID = '20120911003905200001')

excel.desc: 計畫申請事業單位年度合作學校檔

param.funcParam: SELECT SCHOOL_BASE_UID FROM TD_SCHOOL_BASE WHERE SCHOOL_ID = '#SCHOOL_ID#'
